alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:40PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sanpete...northeastern Juab...northwestern Emery...western Carbon and southwestern Utah Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 839 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nephi, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nephi, Mount Pleasant, Rocky Ridge, Mona, Fairview, Fountain Green, Levan, Milburn, Indianola and Birdseye. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 210 and 240. US Route 6 between mile markers 195 and 198. US Route 89 between mile markers 279 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
